data: PED ONCS Low Dose DOPamine Infusion (Module)
Obtain blood work via peripheral sites until patients have stabilized on DOPamine infusion and until provider communicates that blood work may be obtained from the central line
Refer to Oncology low dose DOPamine nursing policy and procedure
Flow rates to be double checked using the following calculation. Infusion rate mL/hr = Dose (mcg/kg/min) x weight (kg) x 60 (min/h) divided by concentration (1600 mcg/mL)
DOPamine PED titratable infusion (1.6 mg/mL) standard in D5W
Titrate, IV, mcg/kg/min starting rate, 1 mcg/kg/min minimum rate, 5 mcg/kg/min maximum rate, titrate instructions: Titrate as per provider instructions to meet desired MAP
